description: Senior Secretariat team, led by Nikola, meets in urgent session after tribunal unrest. Nikola decides to prioritize stability and signs an emergency order, requesting Directorate intervention and the limited restoration of BCI controls.

Emergency directive takes effect: Directorate forces mobilize, establishing ration lines and security checkpoints. BCI is reactivated in a limited mode to control citizen movement and resource allocation.
Directorate patrols deploy across Stenograd, restoring curfews and rationing enforced via electronic passes tied to BCI scores. Frustration builds among citizens as daily life becomes unpredictable.
Council session erupts in heated debate. Oksana warns that harsh control may aggravate resentment, while Sven insists order is necessary for any transition.

Sabotage surfaces: unauthorized tech groups circulate false BCI status updates, letting some bypass restrictions. Sven makes a cautious public address, promising civil rule will be restored, as citizens quietly organize alternatives amid growing tension.
